channel.title: Openshift 4 on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in Openshift 4 on devopstales

item.title: OpenShift 4.2 with Red Hat CodeReady Containers
item.description: The Red Hat CodeReady Containers enables you to run a minimal OpenShift 4.2 or newer cluster on your local laptop or desktop computer.

item.title: Installing GitLab on OpenShift
item.description: I had to install Gitlab to Openshift recently. Turned out getting GitLab up and running on OpenShift is not so easy.

item.title: Install Gitlab runner on Openshift
item.description: In this post I will configure a gtlab rubber for Openshift.
